fast3d.simple.controls

Class RotationAutoControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • fast3d.control.Control
      • fast3d.control.SimpleControl
        • fast3d.simple.controls.RotationAutoControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.ContainerListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class RotationAutoControl
extends SimpleControl
    SimpleTopDownRotationAutoControl
    an automated control rotating the camera around the universes center (Vector3d.zero())
    Author:
    Tim Trense

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double distanceToZero
      the cameras distance from Vector3d.zero()
      default is 5
      double rotPerSecond
      the rotation speed in radiant per second
      default is Math.PI / 8 meaning 16 seconds per round
      double rx
      angle determining whether to look up or down to the Vector3d.zero()
      default is Math.PI / 4
      double ry
      the current rotation angle in radiant

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RotationAutoControl(SimplePanel3d p3d)
      constructs a rotation on the camera
